title: Konna Hatsukoi
sinopse:
1-3. Konna Hatsukoi
The super shy Kashiwagi Makoto from the student council has never been in love before. Although she thinks the popular new student Yanase Yutaka-kun is quite unapproachable, she comes in direct contact with him one day as a part of her student council duties… (Source: Dazzling Scans)

4. Kirai Uta

5. Kimi Daruma.
   The joys of a couple spending Christmas together.

7. Kimi wo Mamoru Hana

8. Omikuji no Usotsuki
